review: Use it everyday day from either my IPad, my Macbook Pro or my iPhone.  Great product.  I've had this for almost a year now and I have not had any problems!
author: Betsy

review: An excellent way to watch Netflix on a non smart tv. I highly recommend this!
author: RJ

review: I use it constantly. It is a nice tool.It streams lower resolution than my tablet would from the same video source with no way of telling it to use the higher resolution stream.
author: Amazon Customer
